com.cubeia.firebase.api.service
Class ServiceRegistryAdapter

java.lang.Object
  com.cubeia.firebase.api.service.ServiceRegistryAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
ServiceRegistry
public class ServiceRegistryAdapter
extends Object
implements ServiceRegistry

NB: This class is within the public API because of build reasons, it should only be used for testing! It will be moved shortly. See Trac issue #417.

This adapter has the following properties:

  • It has a map with contract -> implementation associations, with add/remove methods
The getServiceInstance(Class) method uses an unchecked cast.

Author:
Larsan

getServiceInfo

public ServiceInfo getServiceInfo(String publicId)
Description copied from interface: ServiceRegistry
This method retrieves the public information known about a particular service. If the public id is not known null is returned.

Specified by:
getServiceInfo in interface ServiceRegistry
Parameters:
publicId - Public id of the service, must not be null
Returns:
The service info with the id, or null if not found

getServiceInfo

public <T extends Contract> ServiceInfo getServiceInfo(Class<T> contract,
                                                       String publicId)
Description copied from interface: ServiceRegistry
This method retrieves the public information known about a particular service. If the public id is not known the registry will attempt to match the given contract class to available services, and should multiple services declare the same contract the first instance found will be returned.

Specified by:
getServiceInfo in interface ServiceRegistry
Parameters:
contract - Class of the contract, must not be null
publicId - Public id of the service if known, may be null
Returns:
The first service info found of the specific service class, or null if none was found

getServiceInstance

public Contract getServiceInstance(String publicId)
Description copied from interface: ServiceRegistry
This method retrieves the public contract for a particular service. If the public id is not known null is returned.

Specified by:
getServiceInstance in interface ServiceRegistry
Parameters:
publicId - Public id of the service, must not be null
Returns:
The service contract with the id, or null if not found
